review: Everything in one place. I'm so happy with this product
author: Lw

review: This is great when it works. Unfortunately of the 4 TVs purchased in the last 5 years the Fire Stick was supported by only 1 of them (the oldest). And I'm talking Samsung and Sony models. Very good hype - not good support.
author: Mo2Buy

review: I really thought I would be able to watch all kinds of movies and shows. But NO I have to pay for everything. No not what I expected at all.
author: lady gold

review: This is a great addition to accessing Prime Video and other services.
author: Chris Marbaker

review: Incredible price, very easy install, easy to use.  GREAT product!
author: Daniel Lukas

review: Performs great and so much more value for the money when compared to a cable / satellite subscription.
author: VIP

review: Just a bit non-user friendly with additional apps manager.
author: Carl Rodriguez

review: I am done with TV costs.  I can get my viewing shows from this.

review: So cheap! Why not buy one! Great and easy for Netflix and prime movies and tv
